price: 41. Arba ar jie turi partnerių? Tada lai jie atsiveda savo partnerius, jei jie yra tiesą sakantys.
arabic: أَمۡ لَهُمۡ شُرَكَآءُ فَلۡيَأۡتُواْ بِشُرَكَآئِهِمۡ إِن كَانُواْ صَٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: am lahum shurakāu falyatū bishurakāihim in kānū ṣādiqīna
